Package aom.scripting.xs.ai.plan

Class DefendPlan

Object
Plan
DefendPlan
public class DefendPlan
extends Plan
This class provides a collection of AI commands concerning Plans.
Author:
WarriorMario - warriormario[a]live.com
See Also:
AoM Reference or AoT Reference for a complete list of all plan constants and more.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int cDefendPlanAttackTypeID
    The Type ID of the attack?
    int cDefendPlanCurrentWaypoint
    The current waypoint of the patrol.
    int cDefendPlanDefendAreaID
    The area that is defended.
    int cDefendPlanDefendBaseID
    The base that is defended.
    int cDefendPlanDefendPoint
    The point that is defended.
    int cDefendPlanDefendTargetID
    The target that the plan tries to defend.
    int cDefendPlanEngageRange
    The aggro range of the units in the defend plan.
    int cDefendPlanGatherDistance
    The maximum gather distance the units will use to gather around a point or when patrolling the distance the units will have to be in reach of the waypoint before continueing with the next.
    int cDefendPlanGatherPercentage
    The % of units in the plan that need to be gathered to consider the gathering complete.
    int cDefendPlanLastRefreshTime
    Last time since the plan was updated.
    int cDefendPlanPatrol
    Set to 1 to enable patrolling over the given waypoints stored in cDefendPlanPatrolWaypoint.
    int cDefendPlanPatrolWaypoint
    The waypoints to patrol over.
    int cDefendPlanRefreshFrequency
    How frequently the plan needs to update.
    int cDefendPlanTargetID
    The current targets that are selected by the defend plan.
    int cPlanDefend
    The ID value of the defend plan.
